title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 93.1 - Definition of meter
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 93.1 - Definition of meter

State Regulations

For the purposes of this Part, the term meter shall include
all meters and associated devices used for the determination of the units of
electric service furnished to consumers. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
93.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
